QuestData.Title: They All Fall Down
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari do not tolerate weakness in their ranks, $c.$b$bThose that are deemed weak are often sacrificed in barbaric ceremonies. The victims' spirits are captured and entombed within the sentries you see guarding the grounds.$b$bI wish to study their essence. For this I will need your help.$b$bTake this resonance crystal and siphon the spirits from the sentry corpses.$b$b Do not allow them to escape!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Spirit-Bound Sentries and then use the Resonance Crystal to capture the Zandalari Spirits trapped within.
